name: FastMath
description:
Math is easy, right? Not when there's a time limit!

FastMath is a simple game in which you must rapidly solve math problems. The problems get more difficult as you progress, and you only have a few seconds to answer each question! Answer as many questions as you can, and try to get a new high score!

NOTE: If the HTML game doesn't work, you can always download the game below.

FastMath was developed by Devon Ulrich, with assistance from Leon Takahashi. The font used in the game is Roboto by Google. The in-game music is Run, Don't Walk by Lifeformed.
